text: The Korean singer, found unresponsive at home in Seoul, reportedly died after going into cardiac arrest Seo Minwoo of K - pop boyband 100 % has died aged 33. The Korean singer, who performed as Minwoo, was found without a pulse at his home in Seoul on the evening of 25 March, and was pronounced dead by first responders. The cause of death is reportedly cardiac arrest. The band ’ s label, Top Media, paid tribute to the artist on its website : “ His family, the 100 % members, and the Top Media artists and staff members are all grief - stricken and in mourning from the unexpected, sad news. ” Minwoo ’ s family have requested a private funeral.
